Title: Ice Age
Writer: Michael J. Wilson (story), Michael Berg (screenplay), Michael J. Wilson (screenplay), Peter Ackerman (screenplay), James Bresnahan (additional story), Doug Compton (additional story), Mike Thurmeier (additional story), Jeff Siergey (additional story), Galen T. Chu (additional story), Xeth Feinberg (additional story)
Actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic
Plot: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 30 nominations.
